resources.string: 4 Easy Steps To Try AR Jewellery.
Step 1. Download and print the following PDF document featuring the refrence image.
Step 2. Cut out the refrence image along the lines.
Step 3. Wear the refrence image as a watch belt on your hand or else ring image on your finger.
Step 4. Open the app and hover it over your wrist to recognize the image and show the 3D models of the watches/ring.
